text: The 2017 Honkbal Hoofdklasse season is the 87th season of baseball in the Netherlands. ==Clubs== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" ! Team !! City !! Stadium !! Ref |- | DSS | Haarlem | Pim Mulier Sportpark | |- | Curaçao Neptunus | Rotterdam | Neptunus Familiestadion | |- | L&D; Amsterdam | Amsterdam | Sportpark Ookmeer | |- | De Glaskoning Twins | Oosterhout | Slotbosse toren Park | http://twinsbaseball.nl |- | HCAW | Bussum | Sportvallei | |- | UVV | Utrecht | Sportpark De Paperclip | |- | Vaessen Pioniers | Hoofddorp | Sportpark Pioniers | |} Seven teams participated in the 2017 season. De Glaskoning Twins was promoted from the Honkbal Overgangsklasse. ==Regular season== ==Play-off== ==Relegation/promotion play- offs== ==References== Category:Honkbal Hoofdklasse Category:2017 in baseball
